content: Be wary when dodging around to his back, or when you see him reposition himself by hopping and turning his body. Instead of landing from the hop, he’ll spring out his legs with surprising reach to perform a frog leg kick with massive power, and can use it twice in a row!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Be wary when dodging around to his back, or when you see him reposition himself by hopping and turning his body. Instead of landing from the hop, he’ll spring out his legs with surprising reach to perform a frog leg kick with massive power, and can use it twice in a row!
